bibl.title: Tenancy and Oasis Agriculture on an Egyptian Estate of the 4th c. A.D.
bibl.note: Article compte rendu de: Roger S. BAGNALL (edited by), with contributions from C.A. HOPE, R.G. JENKINS, A.J. MILLS, John L. SHARPE III, Ursula THANHEISER and Guy WAGNER, The Kellis Agricultural Account Book (P. Kell. IV Gr. 96) (Oxford, 1997).
KEHOE Dennis P., Tenancy and Oasis Agriculture on an Egyptian Estate of the 4th c. A.D.
